value:
$WmMPID_開花エリンシア,ch11_28_Erincia_F_Bloom01,Face|The stress that must come with being
under constant threat of invasion is
almost more than I can fathom.$k$pLucia, Geoffrey... I would like to
aid the Order of Heroes in their
important work protecting Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_ルキノ,ch11_30_Lucino_F_Normal,Face|Of course. As always, your wishes
are our commands, Your Majesty.
You need only give the word.$k$p$WmMPID_ジョフレ,ch11_29_Jofre_M_Normal,Face|No matter the world, Lucia and
I are devoted to seeing your every
order be made reality.$k$p$WmMPID_開花エリンシア,ch11_28_Erincia_F_Bloom01,Face|Thank you both. It is heartening to
have the two of you here by my side.
You are like family to me.$k$pAh! Princess Sharena! As you may
have overheard, we three will spare
no effort aiding you in your cause.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|That's wonderful news. Thank you!
I'm sure we'll need your support
sooner rather than later.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|It is truly humbling to be in the
presence of such unflinching
devotion—it touches my heart!$k$pI fear I could not adequately express
my joy at your joining us in words...
It would simply take too many!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I seem to remember there being
another Hero who was summoned
along with you?$k$pHe had a funny little mustache,
if I recall...$k$p$WmMPID_ルキノ,ch11_30_Lucino_F_Normal,Face|Ah, you mean Bastian. He hasn't
been back since setting off to take
care of something this morning.$k$p$WmMPID_ジョフレ,ch11_29_Jofre_M_Normal,Face|He mentioned wanting to take in all
the sights and sounds that Askr and
the Order of Heroes have to offer.$k$pHe may be on the...unique side, but
he, too, is a loyal retainer to Queen
Elincia. He will surely lend his aid.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|I have heard only praise about all
those who accompanied you here,
so I look forward to meeting him.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ユリシーズ,ch11_31_Ulysses_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|I have returned once more! My thanks
for granting leave to wander as I will,
Your Majesty.$k$p$WmMPID_開花エリンシア,ch11_28_Erincia_F_Bloom01,Face|Welcome back, Bastian. I would hear
it from the man himself: What sights
did you witness out in Askr?$k$p$WmMPID_ユリシーズ,ch11_31_Ulysses_M_Normal,Face|This land is one of bounty, truth be
told. The kingdom's people place
full faith in the Order of Heroes.$k$pThough it is a land of many differing
ways of life and ways of thought, all
those here work in harmony.$k$pThe sights I have witnessed are like
visions from a future Crimea, a dream
here made real.$k$p$WmMPID_ジョフレ,ch11_29_Jofre_M_Normal,Face|That is high praise! This is surely
not just any kingdom we've found
ourselves in...$k$p$WmMPID_ユリシーズ,ch11_31_Ulysses_M_Normal,Face|I could expound upon its many
qualities for hours and hours—I need
but word from Queen Elincia.$k$p$WmMPID_ルキノ,ch11_30_Lucino_F_Normal,Face|While I understand the good Count
Fayre may have all the time in the
world, she, unfortunately, does not.$k$p$WmMPID_ユリシーズ,ch11_31_Ulysses_M_Normal,Face|Alas! A shame indeed... If you desire
a shortened tale, I shall present my
view abridged!$k$pTo speak in simple terms: Askr's
kingdom stands deserving our most
fierce allegiance.$k$pI fully endorse Her Majesty's choice
to lend our aid to Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_開花エリンシア,ch11_28_Erincia_F_Bloom01,Face|That puts my heart at ease. Let us
then devote our full effort toward
assisting the Order of Heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_ユリシーズ,ch11_31_Ulysses_M_Normal,Face|Ah, first, my queen, I would offer a
humble read of the Order's tactics...$k$pIn truth, if they maintain the present
path they tread, defeat will surely
come for them in the days ahead...$k$p
